programme.title: Offroad & Fun, Part 35
programme.desc: Hail Rally & FIM X-Trials Championship 2025.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Röhrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In the 1930s the famous Silver Arrows by Auto Union that were designed by Ferdinand Porsche celebrated great successes at the European Drivers' Championship and several Grand Prix races despite the strong competition by Mercedes-Benz.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: Rallye Year 1972 - A Ford success story
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which was run from 1970 to 1972. Car manufacturers such as Porsche, Renault, Opel and Ford took part in this competition, with Ford having an exceptionally successful year in 1972.

programme.title: Mercedes 300 SL Lightweight
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL 'lightweight' on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Bentley Mulsanne EWB
programme.desc: The long version of the Bentley Mulsanne is a prime example of a chauffeured limousine. With it, the British luxury car brand has set the bar extremely high when it comes to automotive comfort.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option. The Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people. When it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list. We took a closer look at these three open-top contenders.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Paris Motor Show features the automotive world of tomorrow. In 2016 Mercedes-Benz introduced their “Generation EQ” and Volkswagen announced to build 20 new electrified models by 2020, possibly in order to distract from the emission scandal.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: What would make coupe fans opt for a more traditional two-door model like the Mercedes-Benz E400 instead of its bigger brother, the CLS with four doors? Also: does the Volkswagen Arteon stand a chance against the Mercedes CLS?

programme.title: Arden AJ23
programme.desc: A Jaguar that is able to terrify the world alone with its roar. This Jaguar F-Type R tuned by Arden is a real bad boy. Already in the series production configuration, the F-Type R Coupe is a dream car that can really bite but this Jaguar which has been upgraded from Arden, now calls itself "AJ23“ and is more powerful, louder and more aggressive than any of his brothers.

programme.title: Volvo S90
programme.desc: It looks sportier than one might expect from the Swedes. The taillights frame the powerful looking rear. On the inside, the Volvo S90 impresses with the finest materials and soft nappa leather.

programme.title: Audi MTM S8 Talladega R
programme.desc: The Audi S8 Plus is by no means underpowered, but it is and remains faithful to this model series' understatement. Those who want more power can get a boost from MTM.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Winning the iconic Dakar Rally for a record 13 times, Frenchman Stéphane Peterhansel had a rather unusual career as he switched from motorbikes to cars and was enormously successful with both vehicles.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Alois Ruf is the founder of a small, but well-known car manufacturing company in Bavaria that specialises in building their own vision of street legal super sports cars on the foundation of Porsche bodys.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: From the 1950s to 1970s Hans Herrmann came to fame as a successful Formula 1 and sportscar driver for manufacturers like Porsche, Mercedes-Benz and Maserati who also won also the 24 Hours of Le Mans several times.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: People called her the "Queen of the Nordschleife" when she used to drive her Porsche or BMW racing cars at the Nürburgring's famous Nordschleife. Sabine Schmitz was a successful racing driver before she took a career turn by working as a TV presenter.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: When Land Rover decided to end their production of the Defender after more than 60 years, a successor needed to be determined. Also: the SsangYong Rexton, the Jeep Renegade and our pick of the top 5 off-roaders.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: Alpina B5 Touring vs. Jaguar XF Sportbrake
programme.desc: The Audi RS6 and the Mercedes E63 AMG are the two top sportsters among station wagons. Alpina came up with the B5 Twin Turbo, their BMW-based answer to the competition. Also: the agile Skoda Octavia Combi. And: the Jaguar XF Sportbrake.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The off-road specialists from Delta 4x4 turned a Volkswagen Amarok into their so-called Beast and challenged Toyota off-road expert Alexander Wohlfarth in his Toyota Hilux. Which one of these 4x4 powerhouses fares better?

programme.title: Cadillac Escalade
programme.desc: The Cadillac Escalade at first seems like a typical rather beefy American car, but this luxurious SUV is more of a lovable, gentle giant, that should be able to gain sympathy with its clientele.

programme.title: Seat Alhambra
programme.desc: Although the Seat Alhambra doesn’t look particularly sporty, but when tested by two professional bikers, it shows that it is not to be underestimated.

programme.title: KIA Sorento
programme.desc: The Sorento is the flagship vehicle in the KIA model range. The Korean manufacturer hopes to conquer the premium SUV market by offering good quality at an attractive price. Does the Sorento meet the standards of a premium class vehicle?

programme.title: Motorvision Specials
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the world's most remote areas. In 2017, the destination was Peru. Part 1 of 4.

programme.title: Motorvision Specials
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the world's most remote areas. In 2017, the destination was Peru. Part 2 of 4.

programme.title: Motorvision Specials
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the world's most remote areas. In 2017, the destination was Peru. Part 3 of 4.

programme.title: Motorvision Specials
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the world's most remote areas. In 2017, the destination was Peru. Part 4 of 4.

programme.title: Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10
programme.desc: The ice course on Lungauring, the Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10 in winter training. Twelve participants in six Evos were taught the art of drifting with a four-wheel drive car. We accompanied a student on his first drifting experience.

programme.title: Cadillac Escalade
programme.desc: The Cadillac Escalade at first seems like a typical rather beefy American car, but this luxurious SUV is more of a lovable, gentle giant, that should be able to gain sympathy with its clientele.
